instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 not video
threads.message:
computer turns on, no video, no usb activity, not external video.these measurements

PPVIN_S0SW_LCDBKLTFET=8.6
LCDBKLT_EN_DIV_L=8.3v
EDP_BKLT_EN=0v
PPVIN_S0SW_LCDBKLT_FET=0v
BKLT_PLT_RST_L=0v

threads.title: 820-00165 not video
threads.message:
Why wasting time checking backlight circuit, if don't get image, nor USB activity?

PLT_RESET_L comes on?
Any history fault?
Did you try known good BIOS?

threads.title: 820-00165 not video
threads.message:
PLT_RESET_L=0V
PM_PCH_SYS_PWROK=3.3V
Any history fault? A LITTLE HUMIDITY BOARD, CHANGE U1930,R1931
Did you try known good BIOS? YES

threads.title: 820-00165 not video
threads.message: Seems to have PCH issue; heat its area with quality flux.

threads.message: problem persists,something that can be done?

threads.message:
